about_the_game:
Survivaluck is a survival for 1-8 players set in a low-poly open-world plagued by a curse. Find rare loot, collect resources, and craft powerful weapons. Don't forget to invest in luck, or you may perish against challenging enemies.

EXPLORE THE HAPPY CURSED ISLAND

Uncover secret areas, secure great loot, and enhance your luck to get the most out of the opportunities. Discover new ores and gather resources to fortify your base.

FIGHT AND SURVIVE

Encounter unique bosses, enemies, and, most importantly, hidden treasures! Strategically place defenses like spiked walls and position your base near resources. Use swords, crossbows, magic and less conventional weapons like poisons and toxic chemicals.

CRAFT AND BUILD

Utilize new technology and rare materials to craft top-tier weapons and armor. Armed with the best gear and a stroke of luck, unravel the mystery behind the curse. Will you break its hold, or perhaps tame and harness its power?
